00001 import wx
00002 from iga.gacommon import gaParams
00003 
00004 #---------------------------------------#
00005 class iGAPanel(wx.Panel):
00006     def __init__(self, parent = None, id = wx.NewId(), size = None):
00007         '''
00008         GUI window for the GA.
00009         '''
00010         wx.Panel.__init__(self, parent, wx.ID_ANY, size = size)
00011 
00012         import leftPanel
00013         if gaParams.getVar('gui'):
00014             import rightPanel as _rightPanel
00015         else:
00016             import newrightPanel as _rightPanel
00017 
00018         # window splitter
00019         self.split = wx.SplitterWindow(self, -1, style = wx.SP_3D)
00020         self.rightPanel = _rightPanel.RightPanel(self.split,
00021                 size = (100, 100), style = wx.RAISED_BORDER | wx.DOUBLE_BORDER)
00022         self.leftPanel = leftPanel.LeftPanel(self.split,
00023                 size = (100, 100), style = wx.RAISED_BORDER | wx.DOUBLE_BORDER)
00024         self.split.SplitVertically(self.leftPanel, self.rightPanel, sashPosition=140)
00025 
00026         self.rightPanel.left = self.leftPanel
00027         self.leftPanel.right = self.rightPanel
00028 
00029         sizer = wx.BoxSizer(wx.VERTICAL)
00030         sizer.Add(self.split, 1, wx.EXPAND)
00031 
00032         self.SetSizer(sizer)
00033 
00034         self.Layout()
00035         self.Show(True)
00036                 
00037 
00038 #-------------------------------------------#
00039     def setPopSize(self, popSize):
00040         gaParams.setPopSize(popSize)
00041         self.rightPanel.setPopSize(popSize)
00042 
00043 #-------------------------------------------#
00044     def setStepSize(self, stepSize):
00045         gaParams.setStepSize(stepSize)
00046         self.rightPanel.submit.SetLabel('Step %d Gen' % stepSize)
00047 
00048 #-------------------------------------------#
00049     def setGeneration(self, gen):
00050         self.rightPanel.setGeneration(gen)
00051 
00052 #-------------------------------------------#
00053     def onRun(self, event):
00054         '''
00055         Runs the GA.
00056         '''
00057         self.rightPanel.onRun()
00058         self.leftPanel.onRun()
00059 
00060         panels_to_display = gaParams.onRun(self.rightPanel.displayPanel)
00061         self.rightPanel.display(panels_to_display)
00062 
00063 
00064 #-------------------------------------------#
00065     def peerStatus(self, status):
00066         self.leftPanel.peerStatus(status)
00067 
00068 #-------------------------------------------#
00069     def onStop(self):
00070         self.leftPanel.onStop()
00071 
00072 #-------------------------------------------#
